#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,m,i;
		cin>>n;
		int score[50]={0};
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>m;
			score[i]=m*3;
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>m;
			score[i]=score[i] + m;
		}
		int max=score[0];
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(score[i]>max)
			max=score[i];
		}
		cout<<max<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
